scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail -n server,client -c green,blue -t="HH:mm:ss" -p="[{name}:{time}]" "ninja-cli node --dev file=./src/server/server.ts" "ninja-cli vite --dev"
scripts.build: ninja-cli vite --build & ninja-cli node --build outDir=./dist/node file=./src/server/server.ts
scripts.preview: npm run build && concurrently -n server,client -c green,blue -t='HH:mm:ss' -p='[{name}:{time}]' "ninja-cli node file=./dist/node/server.js" "ninja-cli vite --preview"
